organization: Research Centre for Experimental Marine Biology and Biotechnology, Plentzia Marine Station
extra_site_info: The selected sampling site is a Marina, close to the main port of Bilbao (Basque Coast, Southern Bay of Biscay). The same site has been sampled in previous years for OSD2019; and OSD2020x12 and for ARMs (2019 and 2020). There are occasional red algal blooms in June and phytoplakton blooms occur normaly from March to April. Monitoring activities in the area include: chemical burden metals and PAHs (sediment and molluscs), acidification, zoo- and phytoplankton diversity, biological effects monitoring

organization: Research Centre for Experimental Marine Biology and Biotechnology, Plentzia Marine Station
extra_site_info: The selected sampling site is in the middle of the Plentzia bay. It is located in the Butroe stuary (Basque Coast, Southern Bay of Biscay). The same site has been usually sampled as control location in pollution monitoring programs.  Monitoring activities in the area include: chemical burden metals and PAHs (sediment and molluscs), acidification, zoo- and phytoplankton diversity, biological effects monitoring
